scholars.name: Omar Suleiman
scholars.title: Imam, Yaqeen Institute
scholars.bio: Founder and President of Yaqeen Institute for Islamic Research, resident scholar at Valley Ranch Islamic Center.

scholars.name: Abdul Rahman Murphy
scholars.title: Lecturer & Author
scholars.bio: Resident scholar and community leader, known for engaging storytelling and practical Islamic guidance.

series.title: The Jannah Series
series.description: A comprehensive journey through the descriptions of Paradise in the Quran and Sunnah. Explore what awaits the believers in the hereafter.

series.title: The Day of Judgement
series.description: A powerful series exploring the events of the Day of Judgement, from the blowing of the trumpet to the final reckoning.
